title: SC applies to students wearing t shirts in protest

content.question: Which of the following Supreme Court decisions allows public school students to wear T-shirts protesting a school board decision that eliminates funding for high school arts programs?

choices.label: Tinker v. Des Moines Independent Community School District (1969)
New York Times Co. v. United States (1971)

content.answer: Tinker v. Des Moines Independent Community School District (1969)

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how a required Supreme Court case relates to a relevant political principle, institution, process, policy, or behavior.
